definition: A term used to describe an individual or team that has achieved the highest level of success in a specific global competition, typically involving sports or games. It refers to the reigning champion of the world in a particular field, often used in reference to international tournaments.

examples.english: Germany is the world champion in football.

examples.german: Der Boxer gewann den Titel des Weltmeisters.
examples.english: The boxer won the title of world champion.

examples.german: Sie ist die amtierende Weltmeisterin im Schwimmen.
examples.english: She is the current world champion in swimming.

examples.german: Die deutsche Mannschaft wurde zum vierten Mal Weltmeister.
examples.english: The German team became world champions for the fourth time.

examples.german: Er träumt davon, eines Tages Weltmeister zu werden.
examples.english: He dreams of becoming a world champion one day.
